overview:
FusionPipe deploys secure virtual computing that allows smartphones, tablets, and ultrabook devices to access corporate resources. We overcome the pain of BYOD and the difficulties of using tablets running iOS for business productivity. We also make it possible for companies to transition from the BlackBerry platform to the iPhone while maintaining the same level of security.

Our product ThoriumCloud is a cloud based security as a service application that overcomes the ‘Bring Your Own Device’ BYOD Problem by delivering secure access to virtual desktops in the cloud from any smartphone, tablet, or ultrabook as well as providing secure access to corporate file servers. The second generation of our software will include secure access to the corporate intranet to access applications from your mobile devices.
